references.paper_title: Community detection and stochastic block models: recent developments
references.reason: This paper provides background on community detection and stochastic block models, which are fundamental to the theoretical analysis in this paper.

references.paper_title: Friends and neighbors on the web
references.reason: This paper is cited as foundational work in network analysis, providing context for the study of community structure in networks.
This book provides a comprehensive overview of network analysis techniques, relevant to the methods and results presented in the paper.

references.paper_title: Contact networks have small metric backbones that maintain community structure and are primary transmission subgraphs
references.reason: This paper directly relates to the main topic of the current paper, investigating the properties of metric backbones in preserving community structure.

references.paper_title: Poisson learning: Graph based semi-supervised learning at very low label rates
references.reason: This paper introduces a semi-supervised graph clustering algorithm used in the paper's experiments, providing a benchmark for comparison.
